TopicTitle: Condor heavy SSTO + Sparrow VTOL with folding wings

Articles.Content:
Hi

I was asked to create SSTO that would transport jet plane to Laythe

so here goes

Condor Heavy ssto

Sparrow VTOL with folding wings

For instruction how to operate it

i highly recommend to watch this video:

craft files:

Condor craft file:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/13qii8ktg2r83ug/Condor%20SSTO.craft

Sparrow craft file:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/0t9m38yjcgrhrmt/Sparrow%20VTOL.craft

(optional) Crane:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6h6mibumskc3aco/Crane.craft

basics:

Condor SSTO

1) Engines on/off

2) toggle engine mode switch

3) toggle air intakes

5) open/close cargo bay

6) open/close docking port

Sparrow VTOL

Engine can get confused at times and turn upside-down

simply right click on engine and hit invert vtol rotation

wings are unfolded with infernal robotics ui

note: To fold the wings back use the zero button on ui (neutral position)

8) raise vtol engine

9) lower vtol engine

0) toggle engine

You will most likely need mods:

B9 aerospace

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25241-0-22-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c-New-pods-IVAs-engines-fuselages-structures

RCSBuildAid

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35996-0-23-RCS-Build-Aid-v0-4-4-New-average-center-of-mass-marker

Kerbal Engineer Redux

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230-0-23-Kerbal-Engineer-Redux-v0-6-2-3

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-23-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v1-7-1-18-14-v2-0x2-experimental-available!

KAS

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25563-0-21-1-KAS-v0-4-3-Struts-pipes-part-storage-containers-merged-winches-more

Infernal Robotics

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37707-0-23-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Parts-Infernal-Robotics-0-10-%2812-17-2013%29

Edited April 8, 2014 by DirkLarien
